title: 4 Easy Steps to See Your Total Purchase History on Valorant

steps.title: Go to the Purchase History page in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to the Purchase History page in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click LOG IN and enter your account information.
steps.content: Click LOG IN and enter your account information. This is the red button at the center of the page. If you don't remember your password , select Can't sign in? at the bottom of the page to reset it.

steps.title: Select Purchase History.
steps.content: Select Purchase History . This is the button underneath the search bar.

steps.title: Select Get My Purchase History.
steps.content: Select Get My Purchase History . This is the red button at the center of the page. You'll see your purchase history from the creation of your account with the total amount spent, date and time purchased, payment method, and Valorant points earned. This doesn't include direct purchases such as individual skins, weapon bundles, or Battle Passes.
